about_the_game:
It's lunchtime, and the orders are piling in!

Manage your restaurant by completing customer orders, stocking up on inventory, marketing your business, and cleaning up the dinning room. Lunch Tycoon is a management strategy game where you run all parts of your restaurant. Keep customers happy and you'll earn stars, but miss too many orders and - you'll business will slow to a crawl.

Features:
-Minimalistic Design
-Inventory Management: Keep inventory stocked, buy food when prices are low
-Serve Customers: Fill customer orders quickly
-Clean Dining Area: Clear tables to allow more customers + possible tips
-Your very own office: Run advertisements, and watch your money grow
-Star Rating: Happy customers will increase your star rating. More stars means more $
detailed_description:
Checkout And Wishlist Little Kingdoms



About the Game

It's lunchtime, and the orders are piling in!

Manage your restaurant by completing customer orders, stocking up on inventory, marketing your business, and cleaning up the dinning room. Lunch Tycoon is a management strategy game where you run all parts of your restaurant. Keep customers happy and you'll earn stars, but miss too many orders and - you'll business will slow to a crawl.

Features:
-Minimalistic Design
-Inventory Management: Keep inventory stocked, buy food when prices are low
-Serve Customers: Fill customer orders quickly
-Clean Dining Area: Clear tables to allow more customers + possible tips
-Your very own office: Run advertisements, and watch your money grow
-Star Rating: Happy customers will increase your star rating. More stars means more $

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Quad Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core I5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
